statements: DELETE FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE accessory_name = 'Keyboard' AND warranty_end_date < '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM service_history WHERE accessory_id = 1 AND service_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM warranty_information WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM warranty_information WHERE accessory_name = 'Laptop' AND warranty_end_date < '2023-01-01');
DELETE FROM accessories WHERE id = 5 AND warranty_end < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_provider = 'Warranty Company' AND warranty_length = 3;
DELETE FROM warranty_claim WHERE claim_type = 'Damaged' AND claim_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Accessory WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.' AND price > 100;
